Quote: The band’s Twitter ID’s are @Harry_Styles, @NiallOfficial, @zaynmalik, @Real_Liam_Payne and Louis_Tomlinson.
Harry came up with the band name One Direction.
Liam is an avid fan of boxing.
Niall says he’s only read one book – the American classic ‘To Kill A Mockingbird’.
Liam once confessed to owning a pair of pink hair straighteners. Nice!
Harry says he would happily date a fan! When asked he said: “Yeah definitely, because if you like someone, you like someone. If they’re a fan it shouldn’t make any difference.”
Zayn has three sisters but no brothers. They’re called Doniya, Waliyha and Safaa.
Liam and Niall both share the same middle name – James.
While on the road, Harry likes to bring a candle from home to help him relax.
Harry suffers from somniloquy, otherwise known as sleep talking.
Harry Styles was born on 1st February 1994 making him the youngest member of 1D. His star sign is Aquarius.
Louis Tomlinson was born on 24th December 1991. He’s a Capricorn and the oldest member of One Direction.
Liam Payne was born on 29th August 1993. His horoscope sign is Virgo.
Niall Horan was born on 13th September 1993. Just like Liam, he’s a Virgo.
Zayn Malik was born on 12th January 1993. He’s a Capricorn just like Louis.
If Louis had a superpower, he would fly.
Liam’s favourite colour is purple.
Liam’s favourite film is the Toy Story trilogy.
Liam once cried while watching Marley & Me. Bless him.
Niall is left-handed.
Niall was brought up in Mullingar in Ireland.
Harry’s musical heroes are The Beatles and he’s also a huge Coldplay fan.
Harry was brought up in the village of Holmes Chapel in Cheshire.
Louis was brought up in Doncaster, South Yorkshire. Other famous people who hail from there include Jeremy Clarkson and Brian Blessed.
Louis’s favourite band is The Fray.
Liam spent his childhood in Wolverhampton, the birthplace of Led Zeppelin legend Robert Plant and Slade’s Noddy Holder.
Liam’s celebrity crush is Leona Lewis and his man crush is stand-up comedian Michael McIntyre
Liam has a very unusual phobia – SPOONS! He admits it’s “very strange” and would like to invent an ‘anti-spoons’ app for mobile phones.
Niall’s ideal woman is Cheryl Cole and his man crush is Michael Buble.
Niall’s favourite movie of all time is Grease.
Zayn’s favourite band of all time is *NSYNC.
Niall sang Ne-Yo’s ‘So Sick’ in the X Factor first round and received glowing praise from Louis Walsh. A big Oasis fan, he covered ‘Champagne Supernova’ at bootcamp.
Liam sang Justin Timberlake’s ‘Cry Me A River’ in his 2010 X Factor audition and received a standing ovation. At bootcamp he covered Oasis’ ‘Stop Crying Your Heart Out.’
Louis auditioned to X Factor with Plain White T’s ‘Hey There Delilah’ and got a clean sweep of yes’s from the judges.
One Direction are the brand ambassadors for the computer game Pokémon Black and White and have appeared on TV adverts and performed at events.
It was guest judge, former Pussycat Doll Nicole Scherzinger, who suggested that Harry, Niall, Zayn, Liam and Louis should be put together as a group at X Factor bootcamp.
The ‘One Direction 2012 Calendar’ is the best selling calendar of all time on Amazon.co.uk ahead of Cheryl Cole and JLS’s official 2011 calendars.
Harry’s favourite song of all time is ‘Free Falling’ by John Mayer.
Zayn, Louis and Harry all support Manchester United. Liam is a West Bromich Albion fan while Niall follows Derby County.
Harry makes a brief cameo appearance in Ed Sheeran’s first ‘Drunk’ video.  It was filmed backstage at London’s Shepherd’s Bush Empire.
Harry and Louis are the only two members of One Direction who have passed their driving test.
One Direction have a bizarre pre-gig ritual of eating Haribo sweets together. Louis explained to The Sun:
1D would really love to collaborate with Bruno Mars. They told teen.com: “(He has) great songs, great stage presence, an unbelievable performer. His vocal is absolutely flawless.”
When One Direction announced their debut UK tour, it sold out within 12 minutes of release!
Harry used to be in a band called ‘White Eskimo’.
Louis got suspended from school and had to retake year 12.
Liam recommends listening to Pharrell, Kanye, Jay-Z, and Kendrick Lamar
David Hasselhoff is one of Harry's biggest heroes
Before becoming famous, Harry wanted to become a physiotherapist.
When he was younger, Louis wanted to work on a farm.
Niall loves to bake and makes the best cupcakes ever (according to his dad!).
Liam's dream job is to be a firefighter
Zayn's last name means 'king' or 'chieftain' in Arabic
Harry’s favourite TV show is Family Guy and his favourite movie is Love Actually - however, he tells everyone it’s Fight Club to seem more manly!
While on The X Factor, Harry had a big crush on judge Cheryl Cole and Xtra Factor host Caroline Flack. He’s joked that his man crush is Louis Tomlinson!
Bizarrely, Louis says he likes girls who eat carrots!
Liam also took part the 2008 series of The X Factor making it through to Simon’s house in Barbados where he was cruelly eliminated.
Liam only has one kidney after getting one removed as a kid. He’s completely teetotal and never touches a drop of alcohol, as he explains: “It’s just a choice to be on the safe side.”
On their 53:14min long debut album ‘Up All Night’, Harry gets 7:18min worth of solos, Liam has 7:08min, Zayn has 5:38min, Louis has 1:29min and Niall has 1:24min.
When asked what they couldn't live without, Liam, Zayn and Louis all said their phones. Niall went for music and Harry opted for family.
In 2015, Zayn claimed the favorite thing in his wrdrobe was his Dr Martens boots
Harry once bought £3,000 worth of pizzas for the homeless and hungry of LA.
